summary: This bill amends Title 10 of the United States Code to reorganize and redefine the roles of Assistant Secretaries of Defense. It establishes an Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Industrial Base Development and Engagement, focusing on collaboration with allies including Taiwan. It renames the Assistant Secretary for Strategy, Plans, and Capabilities to include Homeland Defense responsibilities. It eliminates the position of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Homeland Defense and Hemispheric Affairs and expands the responsibilities of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for International Security Affairs to include Western Hemisphere affairs.
